# `bbva-clip-card`

#### `Light DOM`

```html
Card

```

## `Shadow DOM`

####   `Default`

```html
<span class="sr-only">
  <slot>
  </slot>
</span>
<div aria-hidden="true">
  <span class="bg">
  </span>
  <span class="main">
  </span>
  <span class="type">
  </span>
</div>

```

####   `Variant`

```html
<span class="sr-only">
  <slot>
  </slot>
</span>
<div aria-hidden="true">
  <span class="bg">
  </span>
  <span class="dark main">
  </span>
  <span class="type">
  </span>
</div>

```

####   `Partner`

```html
<div class="partner">
  <div
    aria-hidden="true"
    class="partner-bg"
  >
  </div>
  <span class="partner-text">
    <slot>
    </slot>
    <span class="sr-only">
    </span>
  </span>
</div>

```

####   `Partner Logo`

```html
<span class="sr-only">
  <slot>
  </slot>
</span>
<div class="partner">
  <div
    aria-hidden="true"
    class="partner-bg"
  >
  </div>
  <bbva-clip-entities
    class="partner-logo"
    entity="santander"
    size="small"
  >
  </bbva-clip-entities>
</div>

```

####   `Status`

```html
<span class="sr-only">
  <slot>
  </slot>
  (bbva-clip-card-status-blocked)
</span>
<div aria-hidden="true">
  <span class="bg">
  </span>
  <span class="main">
  </span>
  <span class="type">
  </span>
</div>
<div
  aria-hidden="true"
  class="overlay status"
>
  <div class="overlay-bg">
  </div>
  <cells-icon
    class="overlay-icon"
    icon="coronita:block"
    size="24"
    style="--cells-icon-size:1.5rem;"
  >
  </cells-icon>
</div>

```

####   `Pay compatibility`

```html
<span class="sr-only">
  <slot>
  </slot>
  (bbva-clip-card-pay-compatibility-apple)
</span>
<div aria-hidden="true">
  <span class="bg">
  </span>
  <span class="main">
  </span>
  <span class="type">
  </span>
</div>
<div
  aria-hidden="true"
  class="overlay pay"
>
  <div class="overlay-bg">
  </div>
  <span class="overlay-icon">
  </span>
</div>

```
